official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Textile Winding or Reeling Machines.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1993, the duty on textile winding (including weft winding) or reeling machines.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Textile Winding or Reeling Machines.
